data.title: It took 2 Shah Rukh Khans to fight 1 Arjun Rampal in 3 iconic films: Om Shanti On, Ra.One, Don
meta_keywords: two Shah Rukh Khan vs one Arjun Rampal in three Bollywood films
Shah Rukh Khan Arjun Rampal three iconic films Ra.One Don Om Shanti Om
Shah Rukh Khan double role in three films with Arjun Rampal Om Shanti Om Ra.One Don
The most successful on-screen pairing Shah Rukh Khan Arjun Rampal Ra.One Om Shanti Om Don
data.meta_description: Shah Rukh Khan and Arjun Rampal have done three classic films together and all three of them share an uncanny similarity. In Don (2006), Om Shanti Om (2007) and Ra.One (2011), it to two Shah Rukh Khans to take on one Arjun Rampal.
data.text:
Between 2006 to 2011, Shah Rukh Khan and Arjun Rampal proved to be formidable duo on the big screen and starred together in three iconic films.

Despite belonging to extremely different genres, these three films featured an uncannily similar trope - two Shah Rukh Khans vs one Arjun Rampal. Check out:

In Farhan Akhtar's 'Don', SRK played Don and his doppelganger Vijay. Arjun played the character of Jasjit who fights Vijay thinking he's Don.

In Farah Khan's iconic blockbuster, Shah Rukh Khan played Om Prakash Makhija who reincarnates as Om Kapoor. In both the lifetimes, Om has a common...
